channel.title: Scholarly Communications Discussion Group on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library
channel.description: Recent content in Scholarly Communications Discussion Group on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library

item.title: GIS Outreach with the Harvard Map Collection
item.description: GIS vector dataset showing historic old growth trees in Washington State loaded into QGIS, a map making software. Historic old growth trees in Washington State dataset in QGIS table view. Harvard Geospatial Library (HGL) Georeferenced map of Poland from 1919. Russian Atlas, consisting of forty-four maps..., 1792. Example historical GIS data derived from library archives. Playing card geodata translations codebook. Drawings and sketches by W.D. Peck, 1793-1807, Harvard University Archives.
